featured.text: In 1871, he was appointed to illustrate The Wonders of Yellowstone, a story by Nathaniel P. Langford, who had participated in an expedition to Yellowstone.

definition.zh_def: 納撒尼爾，一個男性名字，源自希伯來語，意為「上帝的禮物」。
definition.en_def: Nathaniel is a male given name of Hebrew origin meaning 'gift of God'.
definition.example: Nathaniel decided to pursue a career in medicine to help others.
